edu.concordia.app.strategy

Class RandomPlayerStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.concordia.app.strategy.PlayerStrategy
      • edu.concordia.app.strategy.RandomPlayerStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RandomPlayerStrategy
extends PlayerStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates an object of random player strategy which is a sub-class of PlayerStrategy.java This class contains the logic for random player strategy.
    Author:
    Team E

      • filterExcessLanternCards

        public java.lang.String filterExcessLanternCards(GameInstance gameObj,
                                                 Players playing,
                                                 java.lang.String opt)
        This method will discard the excess Lantern cards, if the current player has more than 12 lantern cards. The player has two options, either to discard the lantern cards of his choice or to perform either of the three possible dedications.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating game elements according to user choice.
        playing - The current player of the game.
        opt - The string contain options that player can choose (Dedication/discard).
        Returns:
        The string contain those choices that are not used by the user.

      • revealLakeTile

        public LakeTiles revealLakeTile(Players playing)
        The method to ask player to select one lake tile from three lake tiles in hand and return the selected lake tile.
        Parameters:
        playing - The player of the game.
        Returns:
        The lake tile selected by the player.

      • discardLanternCards

        public void discardLanternCards(GameInstance gameObj,
                                Players playing)
        The method to discard the specified Lantern cards of the given player of the game. It will ask for the lantern cards to be discarded and discard the selected cards
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating the lantern cards of the game board.
        playing - The current player

      • makeADedication

        public void makeADedication(GameInstance gameObj,
                            java.lang.String opt,
                            Players playing)
        The method to make a dedication by the player passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object to update its elements according to the dedications.
        opt - The string to choose the type of dedication.
        playing - The current player

      • rotateLakeTileOnUserChoice

        public LakeTiles rotateLakeTileOnUserChoice(LakeTiles tileInHand)
        This method asks takes input from user and rotate the selected tile to 0/90/180/270 degree.
        Parameters:
        tileInHand - The tile to be rotated before placing on the board.
        Returns:
        The rotated lake tile.
